CustomField.description: Use this option to change the border width of choice based questions. Use the number as an input value. E.g: 1 or 2 etc.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Answer Text Border Width allows you to specify the border width for choice-based questions in the survey responder interface. You can enter a numerical value to determine the thickness of the border surrounding the answer choices. For example, entering '1' will create a thin border, while entering '2' will create a thicker border.
CustomField.label: Answer Text Border Width
